item.description:
Hi Everyone,
This is an opportunity to brush up on your rock climbing skills, or if you've never rocked climbed, experience this exciting sport in a safe environment. If you already have passed a belay test there, the cost is $19.00. If you need to take a belay lesson to pass the test, the cost is $29.00. Rental fees are $5.00. I recommend you take a belay lesson if you haven't been climbing within the last year. It's better safe than dropping someone!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the front desk
item.name: Rock Climbing Warm Up
